creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: snow-covered rocks at L with wilted, snow-covered reeds; hazy snowy mountain in background; patches of light gold wash; inscription at R
marks: URQ: 萬里江天萬里心／飄ゝ花絮灑平林／橋橫路斷馬蹄滑／更說藍關轉不禁／右宝磵古詩、承兌叟書 (T URQ: To the right is an old poem by Gyokukan trans
medium: Panel of a folding screen, mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and gold on paper
title: River and Sky in Evening Snow, from the Eight Views of the Xiao and Xiang Rivers
